title: Nursing Clinical Reasoning Ability Improvement Program Using Expansive Case Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and fundamental patient assessment skills
context.additional_context: Emphasizes smartphone-based learning activities in restricted technology environments, combining in-person sessions with online collaboration tools (e.g., KakaoTalk Open Chat)

learning_goals: Learners can improve clinical judgment skills in response to patient condition changes by over 20% through unfolding case analysis.
Learners experience collaborative decision-making processes at least three times through team-based problem-solving activities.
Learners identify at least three errors in clinical reasoning processes and propose improvements through reflective journaling.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
